title: CyclingTips Podcast: On the ground at the 2021 Tour de France
content:
On the eve of the opening stage of the Tour, Ronan and Abby call in from the car after chasing around teams for bike photos. 

Dane previews the first stage of the Tour, picks riders for the win, and speculates what it means for the first week. 

     SUBSCRIBE TO THE ‘CYCLINGTIPS PODCAST‘
Never miss an episode. Subscribe to our CyclingTips Podcast on iTunes, Spotify,  Google or wherever you get your podcasts.
author: Abby Mickey
